title: In-Depth Science Learning Design Using Customized Dual-Layer MOOCs

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Delivering personalized learning experiences using simulation/VR content in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can independently complete 80% or more of science simulation tasks presented on MOOC platforms
Learners can analyze and explain complex scientific phenomena in three stages through VR-based experiments

Learners can select one topic from a science field (e.g., life sciences, physics, chemistry), submit a project outcome structured in three stages (topic selection → experiment design → result analysis) within six months according to an individualized learning path, and achieve a score of 70 or higher based on an evaluation rubric (creativity 30%, scientific rigor 40%, feasibility 30%).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
